hymn.title: Let the glory of the Lord endure forever
hymn.chords: | C - - - | C - Em - | F - G - | C - G - | F - C - | C - G - | F - C - | C - G - | F G C - |

layout.singingstanza: Let the glo -- ry of the Lord en -- dure for -- ev -- er. Let the Lord be glad in His words. I will sing un -- to the Lord as long as I live; I will sing praise to my God while I have my be -- ing.

lyrics.stanza: Let the glory of the Lord endure forever. Let the Lord be glad in His words. I will sing unto the Lord as long as I live; I will sing praise to my God while I have my being.
